snippet: At No. 17 at T.P.C. Sawgrass, where the green is nearly surrounded by water, fans almost cheer as much for a watery landing as for a safe one.
abstract: Fans and players at the Players Championship golf tournament, played at Tournament Players Club at Sawgrass, make bets on whether shots will land in the water at the 17th hole, which forms a moat around the green.
lead_paragraph: At No. 17 at T.P.C. Sawgrass, where the green is nearly surrounded by water, fans almost cheer as much for a watery landing as for a safe one.

headline.seo: No. 17 at Sawgrass, a Watering Hole Awaiting a Big Splash
headline.main: At the 17th Hole at Sawgrass, Awaiting a Big Splash
headline.print_headline: At the 17th Hole at Sawgrass, Awaiting a Big Splash
